mapper.insert: insert into BaphiqUgrpAp (ugrpId, apId, apFunc) values (#{ugrpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apfunc,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select a.ugrpId, a.apId, a.apFunc, b.apCName from BaphiqUgrpAp a left join BaphiqAp b on a.apId=b.apId where ugrpId = #{ugrpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select distinct c.ugrpid,c.apid, c.apFunc from BaphiqinfoUser cross apply dbo.SplitStrings(ugrpid, ',') as a join ugrp b on a.item=b.ugrpid join ugrpAp c on b.ugrpid=c.ugrpid join ap d on c.apid=d.apid where userid=#{userid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and d.apename= #{apurl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
